Name: cannot_match_task_done_outside_sprint
Description: Tasks marked done must belong to a sprint backlog

Name: must_match_ci_test_passed
Description: Only increments with passed tests are releasable

Name: must_match_sprint_goal_defined
Description: Each sprint must have a defined goal

Name: may_match_high_influence_stakeholders
Description: Prefer involving high-influence stakeholders in reviews

Name: must_match_feature_effort_cap
Description: Selected features must respect an effort cap per sprint

Name: must_match_story_points_capacity
Description: Sum of story points must not exceed capacity

Name: must_match_sprint_backlog_committed
Description: Sprint backlog must be in committed status before start

Name: may_match_positive_retrospective_trend
Description: Prefer sprints with improving team satisfaction

Name: must_match_team_size_bounds
Description: Team size must remain within agreed bounds

Name: cannot_match_open_blockers_at_release
Description: No open blockers at release time
